headline: Intuit Inc. (INTU): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Intuit Inc. on Compounding Your Wealth’s Substack by Sergey. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on INTU. Intuit Inc.’s share was trading at $434.09 as of February 3rd. INTU’s trailing and forward P/E were 29.81 and 18.76 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Affirm Partnerships Broaden Reach While Valuation And Momentum Send Mixed Signals
summary: Affirm Holdings (NasdaqGS:AFRM) is expanding its pay over time services to Wayfair customers in the UK and Canada. The company has been selected as the exclusive installment payment solution for QuickBooks Payments through Intuit. Affirm is deepening partnerships with Expedia and Bolt, widening its reach in travel, e commerce, and checkout infrastructure. Affirm focuses on buy now, pay later financing and related services that plug directly into online and in store checkout. By extending...

headline: Tax Season Just Got a Lot Easier For Small Business Owners Thanks to Intuit’s Automated Payroll Platform (And It’s Currently 50% Off)
summary: As tax season approaches, small business owners across the U.S. are preparing for one of the most administratively demanding times of the year. Between year-end reporting, employee tax forms and compliance deadlines, payroll management can quickly become one of the most complex parts of running a growing company.
